title: Murder in St. Luietz
description: Special Agent Deborah BeGoud, uses a backdoor method to kill a committee vote on a contract in the U. S. Senate. Done out of the love for her husband, and to protect him from possible criminal prosecution, little does she know that her actions will backfire. Triggering savage and gruesome murders on the island of St. Luietz, the emotional loss of her husband, and involve both Washington and Moscow to become involved.
author: Richard Nurse
